column2: N-TVA; Pten f/f; H11LSL-Cas9 f/f; Ink4a/Arf f/f; ATRX +/+
N-TVA; Pten f/f; H11LSL-Cas9 f/f; Ink4a/Arf f/f; ATRX +/+

severly paralized to where it looks like it couldn't control bowel movements or urination, noticed on a Monday, but looked fine when it was last looked at on a Friday. Upon necropsy, brain looks normal, huge tumor around the base of the spinal cord, some of the tumor was frozen, used to make a cell line, and fixed.
